name: Google Drive
description: Search Google Drive for files stored in a specified folder, and optionally return the file's thumbnail and unformatted text content.

options.name: OAuth Client ID
options.description: The Google Oauth 2.0 Client ID for your Polarity Google Drive integration app.

options.name: OAuth Client Secret
options.description: The Google OAuth Client secret that corresponds to the Client ID specified above.

options.name: OAuth Authorized Redirect Host
options.description: The authorized redirect host for OAuth authorization requests.  This option should be set to the fully qualified domain name of your Polarity Server to include the scheme (i.e., https://).

options.name: Search Scope
options.description: Choose a search scope for the integration which dictates what files or Team Drives will be searched.

default.display: [Default] Search specific files the service user has access to

options.display: [Default] Search specific files the service user has access to
[Specific Drive] Search the specified Team Drive ID (must fill in the `Drive ID to Search` option)
[All Drives] Search all Team Drives the service user has access to

options.name: Drive ID to Search
options.description: The ID of the Team Drive to search.  This option only has an effect if the `Search Scope` option is set to `[Specific Drive]`

options.name: Display File Thumbnails
options.description: If checked, a found file's thumbnail will be displayed
